page.title: 17SEATS ON THE FORESHORE
page.content:
A project that{Pagham Parish Council} has been very busy with lately, is the purchase of an area of foreshore adjacent to the Pagham Yacht Club, to enable a concrete footpath, leading to a hard standing, to be constructed on the foreshore. A number of seats will be built on this hard standing.
It will then be possible for the elderly and infirm, including people in wheelchairs, to gain access to the foreshore and to be able to enjoy the amenity of the beach the same as other people. This will mean that the council will have been able to provide such seating at each end of the parish foreshore; it was able to do the same, early in 1980, at the beach between Viscount Drive and Channel View.
